Trade/Device Name(s): Pantex AM/PM Salivary Cortisol EIA Kit
Pantex AM/PM Salivary Cortisol Enzyme Immunoassay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Pantex AM/PM Salivary Cortisol EIA Kit for quantitative measurement of salivary cortisol by enzyme immunoassay
Indications for Use Summary: For the in-vitro diagnostic quantitative determination of free and protein bound salivary cortisol in human saliva as an aid in the assessment of Cushing Syndrome and Addison's Disease; measurements of cortisol in saliva are used in diagnosis and treatment of disorders of the adrenal gland.
